PermissionsDenied - com.parkingwang.heypermission.annotations中的注释类型
Denotes that a method to call after the permissions was denied forever.
PermissionsGranted - com.parkingwang.heypermission.annotations中的注释类型
Denotes that a method to call when all permissions was granted
PermissionsNeverAskAgain - com.parkingwang.heypermission.annotations中的注释类型
Denotes that a method to call after the permissions was denied and never ask again.
PermissionsResult - com.parkingwang.heypermission.annotations中的注释类型
Denotes that a method to call after the permissions was denied or granted.
